docsforus.title: DocsForUs
docsforus.technologies: Ruby on Rails, jQuery, Sass, Google Maps API, Better Doctor API, PostgreSQL, CircleCI, Heroku
docsforus.description: This website was created to help improve access to healthcare for members of the LGBTQ community, who often face discrimination, lack of knowledge, and other barriers to getting quality healthcare. This was my Dev Bootcamp final project, which I worked on with a group of four other people. We created the first version of the website in a week, and have been working on improving it since. My areas of focus on this project have been creating the tagging system and the user registration emails.

mosaicmaker.title: Mosaic Maker
mosaicmaker.description: This app lets users choose colors to paint a tile mosaic, and save images of the mosaics they create. I built this app in a couple of days to practice my jQuery and learn how to create file saving functionality.

rutherford.title: Rutherford Rocket Labs
rutherford.technologies: Ruby on Rails, Sass, PostgreSQL, CircleCI, Heroku
rutherford.description: This app was built for a 'client' during Dev Bootcamp. I was part of a four-person team which created this app to allow the fictional Rutherford Rocket Labs company to order rocket parts and keep track of their inventory at different warehouses. It features different roles and functionality for management and non-management employees.
